segments.text: Who is responsible for the accident ? Is it Tony ’ s fault ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . I don ’ t suppose he ’ s to blame . The man in the other car made a big mistake .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mean Tony is the victim ? No , I don ’ t think so . He ’ s equally responsible because he tried to overtake you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . I think everyone should go easy on driving .
segments.speaker: S2
